title: Krispy Kreme Has Brought Back Its Pumpkin Spice Original Glazed Donut for Another Week
text:
From Best Products

UPDATED: Sept. 16, 2019

Krispy Kreme must have heard our cries, because one week was not enough for us to get our Pumpkin Spice Original Glazed donut fill.

“Pumpkin Spice fans have spoken, and we are listening!” the announcement says. “Pumpkin Spice Original Glazed Doughnuts are BACK for an additional week, 9/16 — 9/22.”

The fall-inspired donut was only available from Sept. 2 to 8, along with the new Pumpkin Spice Original Filled Doughnut that was stuffed with cheesecake filling. We wouldn’t mind that one making a return, too!



ORIGINAL POST: Sept. 2, 2019

Krispy Kreme has officially become a masters at the fine art of stuffing a glazed donut. The first ones were stuffed with original and chocolate fillings, which were then followed by birthday cake batter-stuffed donuts and two types of Reese’s-stuffed donuts. Now the shop is making its pumpkin spice donut even better this year.

Not only is Krispy Kreme bringing back its Pumpkin Spice Original Glazed Doughnut, but it’s also introducing a brand-new seasonal donut. For the first time, the brand is stuffing that pumpkin spice donut with a “cheesecake Kreme” to create the Pumpkin Spice Original Filled Doughnut. So you’ll get that same glazed pumpkin spice donut you love, but with the added cheesecake filling to take it up a notch.

Both pumpkin spice donuts will only be available from Sept. 2 to 8. While that’s a short amount of time, Krispy Kreme is making it better by giving us the chance to get a donut for free. Dubbed the “Pumpkin Spice Purchase Protection” plan, you can bring in any pumpkin spice product on the market and trade it at Krispy Kreme for the Pumpkin Spice Original Glazed Doughnut or Pumpkin Spice Original Filled Doughnut. This includes anything from pumpkin spice foods to cough drops to dog treats to room spray. So find something you’re ready to part with and trade it in from now until Sept. 8.

Photo credit: Krispy Kreme More

Don’t get too upset that these donuts are only around for a short time, because Krispy Kreme is keeping its Classic Pumpkin Spice Cake Doughnut and Pumpkin Spice Latte around from now until Thanksgiving.

“Bad pumpkin spice products shouldn’t happen to good people,” Dave Skena, chief marketing officer for Krispy Kreme Doughnut Corporation, said in a press release. “If you’ve been impacted by the proliferation of pumpkin spice products that don’t make sense, come to Krispy Kreme and we’ll make it all better with a free pumpkin spice doughnut.”

description: We weren't ready to say goodbye.
